message: I'm taking most of the money, but I'm willing to give you a little something to start.
Let's split fairly, I take 60% and you take 40%. I believe this is more reasonable than your initial offer.
I'm willing to compromise. I think this is a fairer split, considering your previous offer.
I see we're getting closer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
